participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Motivated and energetic, Alex is passionate about fitness and enjoys connecting with others through shared interests.
participant_1.background: I love my laptop because it keeps me connected to the world when I'm on the go. I enjoy mushroom ravioli with my doberman. I am a weight lifter. I know how to drive a stickshift. I have ink stains on all my shirts.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and creative, Jordan finds joy in family connections and loves to express her individuality through unique projects.
participant_2.background: I met my family through adoption, and I am so grateful to have them in my life. I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation. I run for my mom. I like to recycle my thrift shop finds and make new items. I tore my ACL while racing go carts and couldn't race for the rest of the season.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
Good! I just got back from a long weekend at the beach.
Nice! I wish I could have gone. I was working all weekend.
I hear you. What do you do for work?
I'm a personal trainer.
Oh that's awesome! I love to work out.
Me too! Do you lift weights?
Yes I do! I also like to run.
Me too! I run for my mom.
That's really sweet. What happened to your mom?
She had cancer and she beat it!
That's great news! I'm so happy for her.
Thanks! I am too.
So what do you like to do when you're not working?
I like to spend time with my dog.
Me too! I have a dog and a cat.
Oh that's cool! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a cat.
Nice! I have a Doberman.
Oh that's cool! I love Dobermans.
